file_content.text: Just watch your back with Shai Tenna.
Stop! I surrender. I surrender!
Good grief, man. You're like a cannon on legs. Who sent you?
I'm here on my own business.
No one.
Hey! You're the one begging. I'm not answering questions.
No talking.
I guess a few of us had suspicions, but I'm glad you took out that swine before he could sell us all out to the Voidwolf.
I'm guessing it wasn't just chance that you were waiting here?
Shai Tenna set this as my initiation into the White Maw.
I'm paying my dues.
What can I say? You're just that lucky.
It was coincidence.
This doesn't make us friends, and I'm not answering questions.
We're done here.
Whoa. Back off, man. I'm trying to do you a favor.
I thought you might have come from Shai Tenna.
I thought we could trade. My life, for information about him that might save yours.
My life is one of my most valuable possessions.
Deal.
Give me what you know, and I'll decide what it's worth.
You first.
I know Shai Tenna's been looking for a way to take Kandhar out.
You come from him, I just wanted to give you a warning, kind of a "thank you."
I'm shocked that you think Shai Tenna might not be a model citizen.
You think I need a warning?
It's good to know the weaknesses of your enemies and your allies. It saves time sorting out who's who.
Tell me what you know.
Spit it out already.
Look, you want into the White Maw, Shai Tenna is absolutely the best way.
But he's an ice-hearted, back-stabbing miserable son of a Hutt. Doesn't trust anyone.
Kandhar's sent men for him before--he's got a personal shield generator, makes him basically untouchable.
I'm working with him, not trying to kill him.
What do I care?
Just in case things change, you know? Never hurts to be prepared.
So, did Kandhar just fail, or did you learn anything useful?
Is there a way around it?
I'll just have to shoot harder.
I'll manage.
Won't help. You need to hit the generator, first.
Kandhar was going to try an ion grenade next. Figured, the man's got shields, fight him like a droid.
I don't want to cause trouble, just... keep it in mind. If it saves your life, remember who told you.
That's hardly worth your life.
Not good enough.
But wait! Kandhar had a way around it--use an ion grenade, you know, like for a droid.
That little tip could save your life! Isn't that worth something?
Go, and keep your mouth shut.
Get out of here.
I won't say anything, I swear. Thank you.
It's worth something. Credits are worth more.
How much you got on you?
H--here. Take everything I have. Just... don't kill me.
Sure. Thanks for the tip. Now, where were we...?
No. [Attack.]
No!
